system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.jAxQosHivblcnpQV]{Toughness}, CON 13

Benefits

Once per hour, the character may gain extra CHP equal to their CON score / 2 for 5 rounds.

Special

When the effect ends, and the character would be dying if the hit points were removed, the character instead drops to 0 CHP, in stabilized condition.
system.summary: Gain temp CHP once per hour.
